alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Scott, northeastern Polk and west central Montgomery Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Opal, or 9 miles east of Mena, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Opal... Mimosa... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Big Fork... Board Camp... Pine Ridge... Nunley... Cherry Hill in Polk County... Ink... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Y City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
